title: Dinner Tonight: Broiled Ham Steaks Recipe
full_text:
Dinner Tonight: Broiled Ham Steaks Recipe
Close

Prep
20 mins

Total
30 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode

Ingredients
4
ham steaks
2
tablespoons
ketchup
4
teaspoons
brown sugar
1/4
teaspoon
hot sauce
1
teaspoon
dry mustard
Directions
Preheat the broiler. Wrap some foil around a baking sheet, and place the steaks atop so they don’t overlap.
Mix the ketchup, brown sugar, hot sauce, and dry mustard until smooth. Slather on the ham steaks with a brush.
Place the pan about 5 inches under the broiler. Cook until the sauce caramelizes and the ham is heated through, about 5 minutes.
